config.woodlandfoxverses.general.global_: Enable or disable all Woodland Fox Verses features globally.
config.woodlandfoxverses.general.bubble_: The interval (in ticks) at which bubbles are added.
The duration (in ticks) for which bubbles are shown.
config.woodlandfoxverses.general.show_ma: Whether to show math formulas in bubbles.
config.woodlandfoxverses.general.show_po: Whether to show poetry in bubbles.
config.woodlandfoxverses.general.show_wo: Whether to show words in bubbles.
config.woodlandfoxverses.general.words_t: The type of words to show in bubbles.
